colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,('DIR RJE BTZUN DAM PA SKAL BZANG THUB BSTAN GYI YAB BSNYUNG SKABS KHONG GI ZHAL LAS YAB BSOD RNAMS CHUNG BA'I STOBS YIN PA'I DZAM DKAR GTER SGRUB ZHIG BYED PA BZANG GSUNGS PA'I DNGUL RAB SNYAN GRAGS LA GTER SGRUB THON GSUNGS PA'I 'DON 'DI 'GRIGS TSUL SOGS GSAL BA BZHIN ZHUS PAS, ,AA KHU RIN PO CHE LA ZHUS GSUNGS PA'I AA KHU RIN PO CHE 'DON BSGRIGS ZHIG DGOS GSUNGS NAS DE MA THAG 'DON LTAR THON GSUNGS YIN NO, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
